class.name: QueryBuilder
class.brief_description: A class that helps you with building and running database backend specific sql safely.
class.description: A class that helps you with building and running database backend specific sql safely. Methods by default use escape on their parameters that can normally contain user input. For performance reasons other variants that don't do this also exist. These are prefixed with 'n'. For example [method select] vs [method nselect]. Don't use these with raw user input, as it will make your application vulnerable to sql injection attacks. It contains helper methods that lets you run the finished query directly See [method run] and [method run_query]. You should not allocate this directly, instead get it from you active database connection, like: [codeblock] var conn : DatabaseConnection = DatabaseManager.ddb.get_connection() var qb : QueryBuilder = conn.get_query_builder() [/codeblock]

method.name: asc
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] if (col.empty()): result += "ASC, " else: result += col + " ASC, " [/codeblock]

method.name: begin_transaction
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "BEGIN TRANSACTION;" [/codeblock]

method.name: commit
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "COMMIT;" [/codeblock]

method.name: corder_by
method.description: Closes the current [code]ORDER BY[/code] statement. (Usually by removing the last [code],[/code]).

method.name: cset
method.description: Closes the current [code]SET[/code] statement. (Usually by removing the last [code],[/code]).

method.name: cstr
method.description: Closes the current string. (Usually by adding a [code]'[/code]).

method.name: cvalues
method.description: Closes the current [code]VALUES[/code] statement. (Usually by replacing the last [code],[/code] with a [code])[/code]).

method.name: del
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "DELETE FROM " + escape(params) + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: desc
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] if (col.empty()): result += "DESC, " else: result += col + " DESC, " [/codeblock]

method.name: end_command
method.description: Closes the current sql command. (Usually by adding a [code];[/code]).

method.name: escape
method.description: Escapes the given string and returns it. (Using the database connector's escape method.)

method.name: ew
method.description: (ew = escape write) Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += escape(str) [/codeblock]

method.name: from
method.description:
Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "FROM "
if (!params.empty()): result += escape(params) result += " " [/codeblock]

method.name: insert
land
method.description: (land = logical and) Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "AND " [/codeblock]

method.name: like
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] if (str.empty()): result += "LIKE " else: result += "LIKE '" + escape(str) + "' " [/codeblock]

method.name: limit
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "LIMIT " + itos(num) + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: lor
method.description: (lor = logical or) Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "OR " [/codeblock]

method.name: ndel
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "DELETE FROM " + params + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: next_value
method.description: Closes the current [code]VALUES[/code] statement, and then open an another one. (Usually by replacing the last [code],[/code] with [code]"), ("[/code]).

method.name: nfrom
method.description:
Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "FROM "
if (!params.empty()): result += params + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: nl
method.description: Adds a newline. This can help when debugging sql statements. (Usually [code]\n[/code]).

method.name: nlike
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "LIKE '" + str + "' " [/codeblock]

method.name: nselect
method.description: Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "SELECT " + params + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: nsetp
method.description: Add parameters to [code]UPDATE[/code] statements. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += col + "='" + params + "', " [/codeblock]

method.name: nupdate
method.description: Start an [code]UPDATE[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "UPDATE " + params + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: nval
method.description: Add parameters to [code]INSERT INTO[/code] statements. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "'" + param + "', " [/codeblock]

method.name: nvalues
method.description:
Adds an unescaped [code]VALUES[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "VALUES("
if (!params_str.empty()): result += params_str + ") " [/codeblock]

method.name: nwhere
method.description:
Adds an unescaped [code]WHERE[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "WHERE "
if (!params.empty()): result += params + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: nwp
method.description: Add an unescaped parameter to [code]WHERE[/code] statements. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += col + "='" + params + "' " [/codeblock]

method.name: offset
method.description: Adds an [code]OFFSET[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "OFFSET " + str(num) + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: order_by
method.description: Adds an [code]ORDER BY[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] if (col.empty()): result += "ORDER BY " else: result += "ORDER BY " + col + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: order_by_add_col
method.description: Adds a column to an [code]ORDER BY[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += col + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: order_by_asc
method.description: Adds an [code]ORDER BY ASC[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "ORDER BY " + col + " ASC, "; [/codeblock]

method.name: order_by_desc
method.description: Adds an [code]ORDER BY DESC[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "ORDER BY " + col + " DESC, "; [/codeblock]

method.name: reset
method.description: Resets the QueryBuilder.

method.name: run
method.description: Run the query currently stored in the result property. Use this if your query returns values from the database (an you want to read them).

method.name: run_query
method.description: Run the query currently stored in the result property. Use this if your query doesn't return values from the database (or you don't want to read them if it does).

method.name: select
method.description: Adds a [code]SELECT[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += SELECT " + escape(params) + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: select_last_insert_id
method.description: Adds a statement to select and return the last inserted row's id.

method.name: setpb
method.description: Add a bool parameter to [code]UPDATE[/code] statements. Equivalent to: [codeblock] if (param): result += col + "=1, " else: result += col + "=0, " [/codeblock]

method.name: setpd
method.description: Add a double parameter to [code]UPDATE[/code] statements. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += col + "=" + str(param) + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: setpf
method.description: Add a float parameter to [code]UPDATE[/code] statements. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += col + "=" + str(param) + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: setpi
method.description: Add an int parameter to [code]UPDATE[/code] statements. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += col + "=" + str(param) + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: setps
method.description: Add an escaped string parameter to [code]UPDATE[/code] statements. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += col + "=" + escape(param) + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: sets
method.description: Starts a [code]SET[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "SET " [/codeblock]

method.name: str
method.description: Starts a string. (Usually by adding a [code]'[/code]).

method.name: update
method.description: Starts an [code]UPDATE[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "UPDATE " + escape(params) + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: val
method.description: Adds [code]DEFAULT[/code] to a [code]VALUES[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "DEFAULT, " [/codeblock]

method.name: valb
method.description: Add a bool parameter to a [code]VALUES[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] if (param): result += "1, " else: result += "0, " [/codeblock]

method.name: vald
method.description: Add a double parameter to a [code]VALUES[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += str(param) + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: valf
method.description: Add a float parameter to a [code]VALUES[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += str(param) + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: vali
method.description: Add an int parameter to a [code]VALUES[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += str(param) + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: vals
method.description: Add an escaped string parameter to a [code]VALUES[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += escape(param) + ", " [/codeblock]

method.name: values
method.description:
Adds an escaped [code]VALUES[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "VALUES("
if (!params_str.empty()): result += escape(params_str) + ") " [/codeblock]

method.name: w
method.description: (w = write) Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += str [/codeblock]

method.name: where
method.description:
Adds an escaped [code]WHERE[/code] statement. Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += "WHERE "
if (!params.empty()): result += escape(params) + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: wildcard
method.description: Gets the wildcard character for the given database backend. (Usually [code]%[/code].)

method.name: wpb
method.description: Add a bool parameter to a [code]WHERE[/code] statement. (wpb = where param bool) Equivalent to: [codeblock] if (param): result += col + "=1 " else: result += col + "=0 " [/codeblock]

method.name: wpi
method.description: Add an int parameter to a [code]WHERE[/code] statement. (wpi = where param int) Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += col + "=" + str(param) + " " [/codeblock]

method.name: wps
method.description: Add an escaped string parameter to a [code]WHERE[/code] statement. (wps = where param string) Equivalent to: [codeblock] result += col + "='" + escape(param) + "' " [/codeblock]
